title: Organizational Development Practical Skills Enhancement: STEM Laboratory Design Workshop Using Virtual Remote Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners analyze STEM laboratory design requirements across multiple institutions using a virtual remote collaboration system
Learners propose student-centered laboratory layouts in remote spaces using digital devices and collaboration tools

Learners can propose two laboratory design solutions within a 5 million KRW budget and three technical constraints (e.g., space size, equipment compatibility, safety standards) and submit a final design plan meeting at least two of the three checklist items (cost efficiency, feasibility, safety)

At the end of the four-week course, learners achieve at least 70 points (out of 100) on the assessment rubric (content 40%, delivery 30%, visual effects 30%) by orally presenting design outcomes within 10 minutes and delivering visual materials (minimum 10 slides of PPT/infographics) in project-based assessments (teams of 3–5 members)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
